experiences.title: Fullstack Developer specialized in AI
experiences.description: FCT period: Development of Internal Web Application with chatbot. During my FCT (Training in Work Centers) period, I participated in the development of an internal web application using Django and Tailwind CSS. Implementing a chatbot with a RAG (Generative Information Retrieval system), adapted to the company's specific documentation. This approach ensured that the company's needs were met without the risk of data leakage.

experiences.title: Specialization Course, Artificial Intelligence and Big Data
experiences.description: Development and implementation of machine and deep learning models, programming and application of intelligent systems that optimize information management and the exploitation of massive data.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
experiences.description: Development and design of web and mobile applications for events. Development and maintenance of websites using ReactJS, ensuring the implementation of efficient and attractive user interfaces. Design and development of various web platforms, optimizing user experience and ensuring functionality across multiple devices.

experiences.title: Java Developer
experiences.description: During my FCT (Training in Work Centers) period under the Erasmus program in Poland, I had the opportunity to improve my English level while honing my skills and knowledge in Java.

experiences.title: Multiplatform Application Development
experiences.description: Development, implementation, documentation, and maintenance of multiplatform computer applications, using specific technologies and development environments, ensuring secure data access and meeting the 'usability' and quality criteria required by established standards.
